fields.name: prowlarrUrl
fields.label: Prowlarr Server
fields.helpText: Prowlarr server URL as LazyLibrarian sees it, including http(s)://, port, and urlbase if needed

fields.name: baseUrl
fields.label: LazyLibrarian Server
fields.helpText: URL used to connect to LazyLibrarian server, including http(s)://, port, and urlbase if required

fields.name: apiKey
fields.label: ApiKey
fields.helpText: The ApiKey generated by LazyLibrarian in Settings/Web Interface

fields.name: syncCategories
fields.label: Sync Categories
fields.helpText: Only Indexers that support these categories will be synced
